channel.title: Clan Chat Buttons
channel.description: Hello I was Wondering if i could make these three buttons In the music inferface join,leave,make for my clan chat i need them to somehow when you click the button it applies that code i do not understand please someone steer me in the right direction.][br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 28, 2009, 03:36:22 pm[/size][hr][quote="owndscape"]Hello I was Wondering if i could make these three buttons In the music inferface: join,leave,make for my clan chat i need them to somehow when you click the button it applies that code i do not understand please someone steer me in the right direction.][/quote]
